trans-unit.note: Currently selected slide number read by screen reader

trans-unit.source: 1. What is Election Ke Bazigaar? Election ke Bazigaar is a Free game where you predict which major party will win how many seats in MP, Chhattisgarh, Rajasthan, Telangana and Mizoram Elections 2023 and win up to Rs 10,000 worth of prizes!!! Hurry! 2. Is the game free or paid? The entire game is FREE to play. 3. How will I know if I have won the prize? If you have won a prize, we will contact you over phone/SMS before 15th December, 2023. 4. When will the game results get declared? Check your RANK and D.SCORE on December 5th, 2023 9 pm. Remember to save/bookmark this game link. Happy Playing! 5. Can I change my prediction? You can change your predictions whenever you want, as many times as you want, until 1st December, 2023. 6. Can I win more than one prize? Only one prize per Mobile Number is eligible. You may play with different Mobile Numbers but you can win a maximum of one prize. 7.Do I need to be a resident of the state for which I am predicting? For example, if I am a resident of Karnataka, can I predict for Madhya Pradesh?YES! You can predict for all the states as long as you are an Indian resident. 8.How do I maximise my chances of winning a prize? Follow ABP news, do some research and check past election results. 9. How are the winners decided? The closer you are able to tell the results based upon your knowledge about the subject matter and in depth understanding about the Constituencies/States and all such other related information/facts which shall have a material bearing on the outcome, the higher your rank and the more you are likely to win a prize. 10.Why do I need to Login/provide my Mobile Number? For 2 reasons: 1) Because prizes can only be offered to verified users and 2) To save your predictions. Your predictions are linked with the Mobile Number that you provide. Providing your Mobile Number helps you to change your prediction any number of times.

Predict how many seats each major party will win in the upcoming Assembly Elections 2022 in UP, Punjab, Uttarakhand and Goa. The closer your predictions are to the actual results (announced on March 10th), the more your chances of winning. It is FREE to play.
Step 1 : Click on NEXT to proceed.
Step 2 : Select which State you want to predict for.
Step 3 : Drag the slider bar against each party name and predict how many seats that party will win. REMEMBER: ‘Seats Remaining’ must be 0 for your entry to be valid.
Step 4 : If you are predicting for “Uttar Pradesh” you must predict seats for each of the 4 zones. If you have selected any other State, skip this step.
Step 5 : Click on PREVIEW to preview how you have predicted.
Step 6 : Click on SAVE MY PREDICTION to save your prediction.
Step 7 : If you are playing for the 1st time, you need to verify your mobile number via an OTP.
You can change your predictions whenever you want, until the cut-off date.
Check your rank on the Leaderboard on “ March 11th, 2022 “. Don’t forget to check on March 11th, 2022 if you have won a prize.

For RAJASTHAN* (1 prize):1 GoQii Weighing Scale for the top scorer for Rajasthan.For Chhattisgarh* (1 prize):1 GoQii Weighing Scale for the top scorer for Chhattisgarh.For MP* (1 prize):1 GoQii Weighing Scale for the top scorer for MP.For Telangana* (1 prize):1 GoQii Weighing Scale for the top scorer for Telangana.For Mizoram* (1 prize):1 GoQii Weighing Scale for the top scorer for Mizoram.PreviousNextNotes:1. State-level prize (MP or Rajasthan or Telangana or Chattisgarh or Mizoram) will be awarded to the player whose prediction is closest to the actual Election Results in the respective state (which will be announced on 3rd December, 2023). Game Winners will be announced at on 6th December, 2023, 9 pm. 2. The closer you are able to tell the results based upon your knowledge about the subject matter and in depth understanding about the Constituencies and all such other related information/facts which shall have a material bearing on the outcome, the higher your rank and the more you are likely to win a prize
